item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! üëã My name is Ayush Saha and I am a high school student üë®‚Äçüéì from West Bengal, India. Welcome to my blog and thank you for taking the time to visit. I created this blog as an opportunity to share my hobby with a broader audience and to practice and improve my programming skills in the process. As you read through my articles, my hope is that you’ll gain new insights and perspectives on the topics I write about.
